thread.section_title: Park Central Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Consistent with great service
thread.title_full: Consistent with great service - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nancy H
title: Consistent with great service
text: Impeccably clean rooms, basic amenities, top notch facility and location are required to survive in NYC hotel midtown market. But Park Central knows how to extend above and beyond with guest services and personal attentiveness that are rare and much appreciated. Park Central continues to be our go to destination in Manhattan wherever in the city we need to be and we count on the consistency and excellence that always greets us.
